column3: A new series of thin film composite membranes (TFC) with high CO 2 permeance and CO 2/N2 selectivity was designed and fabricated via coating PIM-1 solution in a mixture of chloroform and trichloroethylene (1:1) on top of a cross-linked PTMSP (x-PTMSP) gutter layer attached to a porous fabric material.

column9: all TFC membrane samples demonstrated a strong synergistic enhancement of CO2/N2 selectivity (α=35.8-55.7) compared to PIM-1 (α=18.5) and x-PTMSP (α=3.7).
